alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 12:09AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette and Dixie Counties through 1245 AM EST... At 1209 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Obrien to 11 miles north of Cross City to near Steinhatchee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Jena, Fletcher Springs, Hines, Jonesboro, Hatch Bend, Eugene, Fletcher, Yellow Jacket, Guaranto Springs and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Lafayette
